languages.text: Высадившись, вы обнаруживаете, что шаттл наполовину занесен песком, а герб фон Валанциус практически стерся с его борта — он находится здесь явно очень давно. Рядом с шаттлом вы находите ящики с археологическим оборудованием, на которых с трудом можно разобрать эмблему Эксплораторов. Большая часть из них сосредоточена у массивных черных дверей ксеносской конструкции — входа в тоннели.

traits.locale_text: Высадившись вы обнаруживаете, что шаттл наполовину занесен песком, а герб фон Валанциус практически стерся с его борта — он здесь явно очень давно. Рядом с ним вы находите ящики с археологическим оборудованием на которых с трудом можно разобрать эмблему Эксплораторов. Большая часть из них сосредоточена у массивных черных дверей ксеносской конструкции — входа в тоннели.

languages.text: After disembarking, you notice that the shuttle is buried halfway in sand, and the von Valancius coat of arms is practically erased from its side. This shuttle has clearly been here for a very long time. Next to the shuttle you find crates of archaeological equipment, on which one can just barely make out the emblem of the Explorators. Most of these crates are lying next to massive black doors of xenos origin — the entrance to the tunnels.
languages.original_text: Высадившись, вы обнаруживаете, что шаттл наполовину занесен песком, а герб фон Валанциус практически стерся с его борта — он находится здесь явно очень давно. Рядом с шаттлом вы находите ящики с археологическим оборудованием, на которых с трудом можно разобрать эмблему Эксплораторов. Большая часть из них сосредоточена у массивных черных дверей ксеносской конструкции — входа в тоннели.

This shuttle has clearly been here for a very long time. Next to the shuttle you find crates of archaeological equipment, on which one can just barely make out the emblem of the Explorators. Most of these crates are lying next to massive black doors of xenos origin — the entrance to the tunnels.

Most of these crates are lying next to massive black doors of xenos origin — the entrance to the tunnels.

After disembarking, you notice that the shuttle is buried halfway in sand, and the von Valancius coat of arms is practically erased from its side. This shuttle has clearly been here for a very long time. Next to the shuttle you find crates of archaeological equipment, on which one can just barely make out the emblem of the Explorators. Most of these crates are lying next to massive black doors of xenos origin — the entrance to the tunnels.

After disembarking, you notice that the shuttle is buried halfway in sand, and the von Valancius coat of arms is practically erased from its side. This shuttle has clearly been here for a very long time. Next to the shuttle you find crates of archaeological equipment, on which one can just barely make out the emblem of the Explorators. Most of these crates are lying next to massive black doors of xenos origin — the entrance to the tunnels.

languages.text: 降落之后，你注意到这架穿梭机一半船体被掩埋在沙子里，侧面的冯·瓦兰修斯家族纹章几乎被磨平了。很显然，这架穿梭机已经在这里搁浅很久了。在穿梭机旁，你发现了好几箱考古设备，这些设备上可以勉强辨认出开拓者的徽章。这些箱子绝大部分都放在巨大的异形黑门旁边，这里便是隧道的入口。
languages.original_text: After disembarking, you notice that the shuttle is buried halfway in sand, and the von Valancius coat of arms is practically erased from its side. This shuttle has clearly been here for a very long time. Next to the shuttle you find crates of archaeological equipment, on which one can just barely make out the emblem of the Explorators. Most of these crates are lying next to massive black doors of xenos origin — the entrance to the tunnels.

traits.locale_text: 降落之后，你注意到这架穿梭机一半船体被掩埋在沙子里，侧面的冯·瓦兰修斯家族纹章几乎被磨平了。很显然，这架穿梭机已经在这里搁浅很久了。在穿梭机旁，你发现了好几箱考古设备，这些设备上可以勉强辨认出开拓者的徽章。这些箱子绝大部分都放在巨大的异形黑门旁边，这里便是隧道的入口。

languages.text: 下船後、あなたはシャトルが半分砂に埋もれており、その側面からフォン・ヴァランシウスの紋章がほとんど消えていることに気づく。このシャトルは長い間ここにあったのだ。シャトルの隣には考古学用の道具が入った木箱があり、そこには探索艦隊の紋章がかろうじて見える。これらの木箱のほとんどは、異種族由来の巨大な黒いドア（トンネルの入り口）の横に置かれている。
languages.original_text: After disembarking, you notice that the shuttle is buried halfway in sand, and the von Valancius coat of arms is practically erased from its side. This shuttle has clearly been here for a very long time. Next to the shuttle you find crates of archaeological equipment, on which one can just barely make out the emblem of the Explorators. Most of these crates are lying next to massive black doors of xenos origin — the entrance to the tunnels.

traits.locale_text: 下船後、あなたはシャトルが半分砂に埋もれており、その側面からフォン・ヴァランシウスの紋章がほとんど消えていることに気づく。このシャトルは長い間ここにあったのだ。シャトルの隣には考古学用の道具が入った木箱があり、そこには探索艦隊の紋章がかろうじて見える。これらの木箱のほとんどは、異種族由来の巨大な黒いドア（トンネルの入り口）の横に置かれている。

languages.text: Tras desembarcar, observas que la lanzadera está medio enterrada en la arena y que el escudo de armas de von Valancius está prácticamente borrado de su costado. Está claro que esta lanzadera lleva aquí mucho tiempo. Junto a la lanzadera hay cajas de material arqueológico en las que apenas se distingue el emblema de los Exploradores. La mayoría de estas cajas se encuentran junto a enormes puertas negras de origen xenos: la entrada a los túneles.
languages.original_text: After disembarking, you notice that the shuttle is buried halfway in sand, and the von Valancius coat of arms is practically erased from its side. This shuttle has clearly been here for a very long time. Next to the shuttle you find crates of archaeological equipment, on which one can just barely make out the emblem of the Explorators. Most of these crates are lying next to massive black doors of xenos origin — the entrance to the tunnels.

traits.locale_text: Tras desembarcar, observas que la lanzadera está medio enterrada en la arena y que el escudo de armas de von Valancius está prácticamente borrado de su costado. Está claro que esta lanzadera lleva aquí mucho tiempo. Junto a la lanzadera hay cajas de material arqueológico en las que apenas se distingue el emblema de los Exploradores. La mayoría de estas cajas se encuentran junto a enormes puertas negras de origen xenos: la entrada a los túneles.

languages.text: Nach dem Aussteigen bemerkst du, dass das Shuttle halb im Sand vergraben ist. Das Valancius-Wappen an der Seite ist fast vollständig abgerieben. Dieses Shuttle liegt offensichtlich schon sehr lange hier. Neben dem Shuttle findest du Kisten mit archäologischer Ausrüstung, auf der du gerade noch das Emblem der Exploratoren ausmachen kannst. Die meisten Kisten liegen neben gewaltigen schwarzen Türen, die von Xenos errichtet wurden. Das muss der Eingang zu den Tunneln sein.
languages.original_text: After disembarking, you notice that the shuttle is buried halfway in sand, and the von Valancius coat of arms is practically erased from its side. This shuttle has clearly been here for a very long time. Next to the shuttle you find crates of archaeological equipment, on which one can just barely make out the emblem of the Explorators. Most of these crates are lying next to massive black doors of xenos origin — the entrance to the tunnels.

traits.locale_text: Nach dem Aussteigen bemerkst du, dass das Shuttle halb im Sand vergraben ist. Das Valancius-Wappen an der Seite ist fast vollständig abgerieben. Dieses Shuttle liegt offensichtlich schon sehr lange hier. Neben dem Shuttle findest du Kisten mit archäologischer Ausrüstung, auf der du gerade noch das Emblem der Exploratoren ausmachen kannst. Die meisten Kisten liegen neben gewaltigen schwarzen Türen, die von Xenos errichtet wurden. Das muss der Eingang zu den Tunneln sein.

languages.text: Après avoir débarqué, vous remarquez que la navette est à moitié enfouie dans le sable et que les armoiries des von Valancius apposées sur son flanc sont presque entièrement effacées. De toute évidence, ce vaisseau croupit là depuis très longtemps. À côté, vous trouvez des caisses d'équipement archéologique, sur lesquelles l'emblème des Explorators est à peine visible. La plupart des conteneurs se trouvent à proximité de grandes portes noires d'origine xénos, l'entrée des tunnels.
languages.original_text: After disembarking, you notice that the shuttle is buried halfway in sand, and the von Valancius coat of arms is practically erased from its side. This shuttle has clearly been here for a very long time. Next to the shuttle you find crates of archaeological equipment, on which one can just barely make out the emblem of the Explorators. Most of these crates are lying next to massive black doors of xenos origin — the entrance to the tunnels.

traits.locale_text: Après avoir débarqué, vous remarquez que la navette est à moitié enfouie dans le sable et que les armoiries des von Valancius apposées sur son flanc sont presque entièrement effacées. De toute évidence, ce vaisseau croupit là depuis très longtemps. À côté, vous trouvez des caisses d'équipement archéologique, sur lesquelles l'emblème des Explorators est à peine visible. La plupart des conteneurs se trouvent à proximité de grandes portes noires d'origine xénos, l'entrée des tunnels.

languages.text: İndikten sonra mekiğin yarıya kadar kuma gömülü olduğunu ve yan taraftaki von Valancius armasının neredeyse silinmiş olduğunu fark ediyorsun. Bu mekiğin epeydir burada olduğu açık. Mekiğin yanında; üzerindeki Keşiftör ambleminin zar zor seçildiği, arkeolojik ekipman sandıkları buluyorsun. Bu sandıkların çoğu; tünellerin girişi olan, zeno kökenli, devasa, siyah kapıların yanında duruyor.
languages.original_text: After disembarking, you notice that the shuttle is buried halfway in sand, and the von Valancius coat of arms is practically erased from its side. This shuttle has clearly been here for a very long time. Next to the shuttle you find crates of archaeological equipment, on which one can just barely make out the emblem of the Explorators. Most of these crates are lying next to massive black doors of xenos origin — the entrance to the tunnels.
